opportunities.name: AI Voice Receptionist & Client Intake
opportunities.description: AI phone system that answers calls 24/7, qualifies leads, books consultations, and captures intake information

custom_solution.approach: AI voice agent using Claude API + Twilio integrated with practice management

roi_example.scenario: Law firm missing 30% of calls, getting 15 new client inquiries/week
roi_example.value_created: Capture 5 more qualified leads/month × €3,000 avg case = €15,000/month

jevons_effect.mechanism: 24/7 lead capture + qualification → more cases → more billable work → may need more associates

opportunities.yc_reference: Similar to MDHub (mental health) and Auto Ace (car dealerships) for AI receptionist

opportunities.name: AI-Powered Time Capture
opportunities.description: Automatically capture billable time from calendar, email, and document activity

opportunities.name: AI Document Drafting & Templates
opportunities.description: Use AI to draft first versions of contracts, letters, and documents from templates

opportunities.name: AI Contract Review & Analysis
opportunities.description: AI-powered review of contracts to identify risks, missing clauses, and deviations

opportunities.name: Automated Client Intake & Onboarding
opportunities.description: Digital intake forms, automated conflict checks, e-signatures for engagement letters

opportunities.name: AI-Powered Legal/Regulatory Research
opportunities.description: AI tools for faster legal research, case law analysis, and regulatory tracking

opportunities.name: Client Portal & Self-Service
opportunities.description: Secure portal for document sharing, status updates, and billing transparency

opportunities.name: AI Email Drafting & Triage
opportunities.description: AI assistance for drafting client emails, triaging inbox, and summarizing threads

opportunities.name: AI-Assisted Proposal & RFP Response
opportunities.description: Automate RFP responses, pitch decks, and proposal generation

opportunities.name: AI Knowledge Management
opportunities.description: AI-powered search across documents, precedents, and institutional knowledge

opportunities.name: Automated Billing & Collections
opportunities.description: Automated invoice generation, payment reminders, and collections workflows

anti_patterns.name: Fully Autonomous AI Drafting
anti_patterns.why_avoid: Client work requires human judgment - AI should assist, not replace review
anti_patterns.what_instead: AI first draft with mandatory human review and approval

anti_patterns.name: AI Research Before Time Capture
anti_patterns.why_avoid: Time capture has immediate ROI, AI research takes longer to show value
anti_patterns.what_instead: Start with time capture and billing automation, then add research tools

anti_patterns.name: Enterprise Tools for Small Firms
anti_patterns.why_avoid: iManage and NetDocuments are overkill for <20 person firms
anti_patterns.what_instead: Start with Clio/PracticePanther, grow into enterprise tools

quick_wins.name: Dormant client reactivation campaign
quick_wins.impact: Re-engage 5-10 past clients per month, direct revenue from repeat business
quick_wins.how: Export clients inactive 12-24 months, send AI-personalized outreach (regulatory updates, new services, check-in)
